definition.name: NavigationMenu
definition.purpose: Provides a composable navigation menu root component with optional viewport for dropdowns or mega menus.
definition.description: A flexible navigation menu root component built on top of Radix UI's NavigationMenuPrimitive.Root. It supports custom class names, children, and an optional viewport for dropdown content. Used as the main wrapper for navigation menu structures.

viewport.description: Whether to render the dropdown viewport. Defaults to true.

initial.data: Navigation menu is rendered with children and optional viewport.

when.description: User interacts with the menu (e.g., opens a dropdown, navigates with keyboard)

effects: Dropdown viewport is shown if enabled

definition.visualLayout: Root container for navigation menu, flex layout, with children and optional dropdown viewport.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Root. Uses cn utility for class merging. Passes props and children through. Viewport is conditionally rendered.

definition.name: NavigationMenuList
definition.purpose: Renders a list of navigation menu items.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.List, providing styling and structure for a group of navigation menu items. Used as a direct child of NavigationMenu.

initial.data: Navigation menu list is rendered with children.

when.description: Menu items are added or interacted with.

definition.visualLayout: Horizontal flex list of menu items.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.List. Uses cn utility for class merging.

definition.name: NavigationMenuItem
definition.purpose: Represents a single item in the navigation menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Item, providing styling and structure for a single navigation menu item. Used within NavigationMenuList.

when.description: User interacts with the menu item (hover, focus, click).

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Item. Uses cn utility for class merging.

definition.name: NavigationMenuTrigger
definition.purpose: Renders a trigger button for opening a navigation menu dropdown.
definition.description: A styled trigger component for opening dropdowns in the navigation menu, built on Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Trigger. Includes a chevron icon and supports custom class names and children.

initial.data: Trigger button is rendered with chevron icon.

visible: Trigger button with label and chevron

when.description: User clicks or focuses the trigger.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Trigger. Uses cn and navigationMenuTriggerStyle for styling. ChevronDownIcon from lucide-react is used.

definition.name: NavigationMenuContent
definition.purpose: Displays the dropdown content for a navigation menu item.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Content, providing styling and structure for dropdown content in the navigation menu. Used within NavigationMenuItem.

initial.data: Dropdown content is rendered when menu item is open.

when.description: Menu item is opened or closed.

effects: Dropdown content is shown or hidden

definition.visualLayout: Dropdown content area, absolute or relative positioning.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Content. Uses cn utility for class merging.

definition.name: NavigationMenuViewport
definition.purpose: Renders the viewport for dropdown content in the navigation menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Viewport, providing a styled container for dropdown content. Used as a child of NavigationMenu to display dropdowns.

initial.data: Viewport is rendered for dropdown content.

effects: Dropdown content is shown or hidden in the viewport

definition.visualLayout: Absolute positioned container for dropdowns, with border and shadow.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Viewport. Uses cn utility for class merging. Wrapped in a div for positioning.

definition.name: NavigationMenuLink
definition.purpose: Renders a styled link for use in the navigation menu.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Link, providing styling and structure for navigation links. Used within NavigationMenuItem or NavigationMenuContent.

when.description: User clicks or focuses the link.

definition.visualLayout: Flex column link with padding and hover/focus styles.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Link. Uses cn utility for class merging.

definition.name: NavigationMenuIndicator
definition.purpose: Displays an indicator (such as an arrow) for the active navigation menu item.
definition.description: A wrapper for Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Indicator, providing a styled indicator (arrow) for the active menu item. Used within NavigationMenu to visually indicate the active dropdown.

initial.data: Indicator is rendered when a menu item is active.

when.description: Menu item becomes active or inactive.

effects: Indicator arrow is shown or hidden

definition.visualLayout: Arrow indicator positioned below the active menu item.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix NavigationMenuPrimitive.Indicator. Uses cn utility for class merging. Renders a div for the arrow shape.

declarations.name: navigationMenuTriggerStyle
declarations.description: A class-variance-authority (cva) style object for the NavigationMenuTrigger component, providing consistent styling for trigger buttons in the navigation menu. Use this to apply the correct classes to trigger elements for visual consistency and accessibility.
